trans-unit.source: Represents the enumerator for <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierData" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierDataCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierDataCollection" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierData" /> 物件列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates through all the qualifiers in the **Win32_LogicalDisk** class and displays their values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的所有限定詞**Win32_LogicalDisk**類別，並顯示其值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierData" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierDataCollection" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierDataCollection" /> 列舉中目前的 <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierData" />。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierData" /> element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中目前的 <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierData" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Moves to the next element in the <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierDataCollection" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 移至 <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierDataCollection" /> 列舉中的下一項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <see langword="false" /> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果列舉值成功前移至下一個項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果列舉值超過集合的結尾，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Resets the enumerator to the beginning of the <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierDataCollection" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 將列舉值重設為 <see cref="T:System.Management.QualifierDataCollection" /> 列舉的開頭。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中目前的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合中目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立列舉值之後，集合已修改。
